title: The Fat film
brief_description: This film demonstrates in a humorous manner the social difficulties encountered by an individual undertaking a weight reduction plan. It presents the story of Kate, her resolve to begin a diet, her failure to maintain it, and her resolution to try again. Related issues include peer pressure, the social significance of food, stereotyping, public/media image of the body ideal.
